View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.hsqldb;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
7   import spring.SpringApp;
8   
9   public abstract class ConcreteHsqldbSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
10  
11      public ConcreteHsqldbSuiteIT() {
12          var property = SpringApp.get("hsqldb");
13          this.jdbcURL = property.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
14          this.jdbcUser = property.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
15          this.jdbcPass = property.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
16  
17          this.databaseToInject = "PUBLIC";
18          this.tableToInject = "STUDENT";
19          this.columnToInject = "STUDENT_ID";
20          
21          this.queryAssertDatabases = """
22              select distinct schema_name
23              from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables t
24              right join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.schemata s on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = s.schema_name
25          """;
26          this.queryAssertTables = String.format("""
27              select TABLE_NAME
28              from information_schema.tables
29              where TABLE_SCHEMA = '%s'
30          """, this.databaseToInject);
31          this.queryAssertColumns = String.format("""
32              select COLUMN_NAME
33              from information_schema.columns
34              where TABLE_SCHEMA='%s'
35              and TABLE_NAME='%s'
36          """, this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject);
37          this.queryAssertValues = String.format("select %s from %s.%s", this.columnToInject, this.databaseToInject, this.tableToInject);
38      }
39  
40      @AfterEach
41      public void checkVendor() {
42          Assertions.assertEquals(
43              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getHsqldb(),
44              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
45          );
46      }
47  }
